title: Mosaic Design System
strap_line: Mosaic is Advanced's design system: a series of design philosophies, resource libraries and UX/UI guidelines that have been built for the sole purpose of supporting software from its inception, all the way to implementation. Mosaic includes a plethora of tools, guidelines, advice and documentation that can be pieced together to create digital products that your users will love.

personas.title: Designers
personas.description: Explore our component and pattern libraries, and begin designing sleek and intuitive experiences for your users.

personas.title: Developers
personas.description: Take a look at the underlying code beneath Mosaic's component library, and learn how to apply them and their variants.

personas.title: Writers
personas.description: Struggling to find a voice for your product? Learn how Mosaic uses tone and voice to stand out from the crowd.

content_cards.title: Components
content_cards.description: Take a look at the smaller pieces that form the Mosaic Design System. Components cover the smaller pieces of functionality that come together to bring your product to life.
